segments.text: I notice a boy on the stool trying to reach into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His positioning is so wobbly, it’s almost like a balancing act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could topple over and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet there’s a mischievous glint in his eyes as he attempts to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both adorable and alarming to witness this secret heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eagerly waiting, her arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so engrossed in their mission, they don’t see the danger they’re in.
segments.speaker: PAR
